alert.note: Alert for Harris; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 24 at 12:54PM CST until January 24 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Montgomery County in southeastern Texas... Central Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 130 PM CST. * At 1253 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Aldine, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Humble, Jersey Village, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Aldine, Northside / Northline, Kingwood, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, Spring Valley, Spring Branch North, northern Greater Heights, Near Northside Houston, Spring Branch West, Hedwig Village, Hilshire Village, Bush Intercontinental Airport, Spring Branch East and Eastex / Jensen Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Texas.
